duties_responsibilities.duty: Development of bioinformatic pipelines for DNA methylation analysis, including quality control and statistical analysis.
Keeping updated with latest advancements in methods/tools/technologies used for methylation analysis.
Supporting scientist with designing of methylation experiments.
Developing and integrating machine learning techniques for data analysis and NGS analysis.
Analyzing and integrating DNA methylation data and designing methods and data management tools for integration of data including NGS.
Manage project timelines with internal personnel and external vendors.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Computer Science or similar
